title: Contact forces - change in microscopic forces

content.question: A bucket rests on top of a crate, which rests on a floor, as shown in the diagram. The bucket is lifted off the crate. How does the force due to microscopic interactions between the crate and the floor change, if at all, as the bucket is lifted off the crate?

choices.label: It could either increase or decrease depending on the materials that the crate and floor are made of.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
